Data Fields
CSRMESH_TIME_SET_TIME_T Struct Reference
CSRmesh&trade; » Models » Time Model

Setting Current Local Time: Upon receiving a TIME_SET_TIME message, the device sets the CurrentTime to the CurrentTime field of the message. This message is deprecated; it should only be used when a device cannot wait for a time broadcast.

Data Fields

CsrUint8Ptr currenttime
 Current local time in milliseconds from 1970-01-01 00:00Z.
 
CsrInt8 timezone
 Time zone offset of current time from UTC (in 15 minute increments)
